title: Mope io

headings.text: Tips and Tricks for Mope io

controls: Move: Move your mouse.Run: Hold LMBChat: EnterDive: W key
content.howToPlay: Pick a username, an animal and enter the map. At first, you can only choose small animals like a mouse, desert rat, shrimp, chipmunk or a tarsier. After entering the map, use your mouse to move your animal. Click and hold the left mouse button to boost your speed, which is essential for escaping larger predators or catching smaller prey.Start by consuming food items, such as fruits, meats and smaller animals. Each bite contributes to your XP bar. When your XP bar is full, you can evolve into a stronger species.Over 117 different animals are waiting to be unlocked. And it's not just the skin. Each species has unique abilities that can aid in hunting or running away from danger.
content.tips: You will consume water as a living animal in Mope io. Keep an eye on your water bar. To refill it, stay in lakes and oceans.Be cautious of animals outlined in red, as they are bigger and pose a threat. If you see one, it's often best to flee.Use your animal's special ability by pressing the 'W key' to gain advantages in hunting.You can hide in holes as temporary shelters, such as underwater or near trees, from predators. However, keep in mind that some stronger animals can force you out.Teaming up can enhance your chances. Press 'Enter' to chat with other players, especially in team mode.
content.developer: Mope io was released in October 2016 by indie developer Stan Tatarnykov.
